amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: College of Medicine; physicians' assistant or associate, defined.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of sections 85-179.01 to 85-179.03, unless the context otherwise requires, physicians' assistant or physicians' associate shall mean a person who is qualified by training and experience to act as an assistant to, or an associate of, a licensed physician.
